forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally clear. Low 9F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 18F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of snow during the afternoon. High 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low around -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
